<!-- Ensure all items are checked before requesting review -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `ruff check` and `ruff format`
- [ ] I have run `mypy` type checking
- [ ] No new linting errors or warnings
- [ ] Code complexity is acceptable (radon cc < 10)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings (interrogate passing)
- [ ] I have updated the relevant documentation
- [ ] I have added comments for complex logic
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md has been updated

### Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] Test coverage is maintained or improved
- [ ] Integration tests pass (if applicable)

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed in code or commits
- [ ] Security scan (bandit) passes
- [ ] No new vulnerable dependencies (pip-audit)
- [ ] Input validation added where needed

### Commit Quality
- [ ] Commits follow conventional commit format
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] No merge commits (rebased on main)
